valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 5 Feb 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 6 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: Low just west of Sole 968 expected Shannon 974 by midday tomorrow. Low Fastnet 970 losing its identity

Easterly or southeasterly 3 to 5, increasing 6 at times in south.

Occasional sleet.

Good, occasionally poor.

South Utsire.text:
Wind
In north, easterly or southeasterly 3 to 5. In south, easterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 in south.
Sea state
In north, rough or very rough in southwest, otherwise slight or moderate. in south, rough or very rough.
Weather
In north, occasional sleet. In south, occasional snow.
Visibility
In north, good, occasionally poor. In south, good, occasionally very poor. Light icing.

Gale warning
Issued:
03:55 (UTC) on Thu 5 Feb 2026
Severe gale force 9 backing easterly imminent
